\documentclass{standalone}
\usepackage{pgfplots}
\usepackage{tikz}
\usetikzlibrary{automata}
\usetikzlibrary {positioning}
%\pgfplotsset{compat=1.16}
\usepackage{raha_tikz}


\begin{document}
  \begin{tikzpicture}[scale=1.1]
    \begin{scope}
    \draw (-1,0) node[opacity=0](i){};
    \draw (0,0) node[rond5,jaune] (a) {} node {$$};
    \draw (i) edge[-latex',dashed] node[above]{$x$} (a);
    \draw (2,0) node[rond5,jaune] (b) {} node {$$};
    \draw (a) edge[-latex',bend left] node[above] {$2$} (b);
    \draw (b) edge[-latex',bend left] node[below] {$-1$} (a);
    \end{scope}
\end{tikzpicture}
\end{document}
